name: Fplbot sample
description: A sample of Fplbot from Dockerhub image

fpl__login.description: A username of an account in Fantasy Premier League

fpl__password.description: The password of the login to a Fantasy Premier League account

fpl__leagueId.description: The leagueId in Fantasy Premier League to follow

fpl__channel.description: A Slack channel the bot should post to
